property.caption: Scanned Image Attribute
property.description: String attribute to store the scanned image as base64 string. This attribute will be available in the On Done action.

property.caption: Height (% of width)
property.description: Height as a percentage of width (aspect ratio). Default is 56% (16:9)

property.caption: On Done
property.description: Action to execute when scanning is complete. The scanned image will be available in the 'scannedImageAttribute' property.

property.caption: UI Template Path (Optional)
property.description: Full URL/path to document-scanner.ui.html. Leave empty to use CDN default.

property.caption: Engine Resources Root (Optional)
property.description: Base URL/path for engine resources libs/. Leave empty to use CDN default.

property.caption: Take Photo Button Text
property.description: Text for the take photo button (default: 拍照)

property.caption: Close Button Text
property.description: Text for the close button (default: 关闭)

property.caption: Retake Button Text
property.description: Text for the retake button (default: 重拍)

property.caption: Done Button Text
property.description: Text for the done button (default: 完成)

property.caption: Detect Borders Button Text
property.description: Text for the detect borders button (default: 检测边框)

property.caption: Auto Crop Button Text
property.description: Text for the auto crop button (default: 自动裁剪)

property.caption: Smart Capture Button Text
property.description: Text for the smart capture button (default: 智能捕获)

property.caption: Upload Image Button Text
property.description: Text for the upload image button (default: 上传图片)
